orangelight.title: Add a search builder that allows use of a new request handler
CDL Login Prompt delayed/not working at all for CDL items
Design the biased search results reporting form

comments.body:
Taking a second look, my only thoughts are: 
1) Don't include the Bookmark check boxes in the result set excerpt. Perhaps also don't include "Availability" indicator?
2) Either make it more clear that the results are an excerpt (just the top 3?) or make it so the user can scroll through all the results in case the biased results are further down.
3) We should probably display the search terms and selected facets along with the results set
4) If someone reports the second page of a result set biased, we don't show the top 10, but rather the set from that page.

Guest Users Can't Request ReCAP In Library Use Materials
Update Search Results Online Display for Records with Multiple Online Portfolios in Alma.
Create text to indicate successful submission of the form

comments.body:
Our current confirmation text upon successful submission of a Report of Harmful Language:

[Private Zenhub Image](https://api.zenhub.com/attachedFiles/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaHBBeFhBQVE9PSIsImV4cCI6bnVsbCwicHVyIjoiYmxvYl9pZCJ9fQ==--e07b59fcbe5a079d74695bc5c67a4ce56e53453a/Screenshot%202023-11-09%20at%203.07.22%E2%80%AFPM.png)

I suggest we use similar language, but not in "letter" format.

> [Your report has been submitted.]
> 
> Thank you for helping us identify an instance of bias in our Catalog Search Results. Staff will review your report and assess options to address this based on your feedback. If you have submitted your email address, we may reach out to you if we have questions. We appreciate your feedback.

I think we might want to offer the user a way to contact someone at PUL on this screen in case they want to follow up on their report. What do others think?

orangelight.title: Enable highlighting in catalog_controller behind a flipper feature

comments.body:
current implementation activates highlighting feature in the catalog_controller based on the configuration in pul_solr. 
Potential tickets that need to be resolved:

- Records in the results page that don't have a search term in the fields that are specified in the solrconfig.xml `hl.fl` highlighting search component will not display the specific field in the search results. For example 1.`title` will be replaced by the unique record id. 2. `Author` will not display.
resolved by https://github.com/projectblacklight/blacklight/pull/3103
